intro: The great adventure of the little Magi begins!
description:
Arcanion: Magi Side Story, takes place after the events of Tale of Magi, where Magi is on a search for her twin, Sorc. Only to uncover some strange happenings in her surroundings causing the locals to become violent, and thus Magi goes to investigate the cause, and hopefully find her twin as well.

-About the Game-
Play through six levels in a retro game styled game, with improved mechanics for Magi, making for greater control. With two additional playable modes, Sorc Mode and Boss Attack.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
